titleStmt.title: Otes his case, character, person, and plot: his laying of things together. The observators declaration, and confession. His opinion of the papists as well as of the popish plot.
titleStmt.author: L'Estrange, Roger, Sir, 1616-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Reprinted for William Weston, Book-seller in Christ-church Lane,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: pages cropped and torn with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: British Library.
